definition: relating to abdominal delivery, the delivery of a fetus by surgical incision through the abdominal wall and uterus (from the belief that Julius Caesar was born that way)
details:
adjective
- relating to abdominal delivery
= synonyms: caesarian, cesarean, cesarian
noun
- the delivery of a fetus by surgical incision through the abdominal wall and uterus (from the belief that Julius Caesar was born that way)
= synonyms: caesarian, cesarean, cesarian, cesarean delivery, caesarean delivery, caesarian delivery, cesarean section, cesarian section, caesarean section, caesarian section, abdominal delivery
